```{r}

```


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
#musicians <- csv_read('csv_data')
conflict <- read_csv('relevant_data_years_type.csv')
```

```{r}
grouped_data <- conflict %>%
  group_by(Type_of_violence)


```


```{r}
ggplot(grouped_data) + 
  geom_count(mapping = aes(x = year, y = Type_of_violence, color = Type_of_violence))
```

```{r}
conflict %>%
  arrange(Type_of_violence) %>%
  ggplot() +
    geom_col(mapping = aes(x = year, y = Type_of_violence, color = Type_of_violence), position='stack')
```
